test-method.name: loginWithSeleniumAndGetCookie
test-method.description: 1. Login to the application using Selenium WebDriver 2. Extract the cookie named 'orangehrm' after successful login 3. Store the cookie value for subsequent API requests

test-method.name: GetLogin
test-method.description: 1. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/auth/login' endpoint with a valid cookie 2. Do not pass any request body (null) 3. Print and verify the response status code and response body 4. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK) and response is HTML page

test-method.name: GetEmpLeaveInfo
test-method.description: 1. Generate the current date dynamically in 'yyyy-MM-dd' format 2. Send a GET request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/dashboard/employees/leaves?date={current_date}' endpoint with a valid cookie 3. Do not include any request body (null) 4. Log the date used, response status code, and response body 5. Assert that the response status code is 200 (OK)

test-method.name: PostEmpStatus
test-method.description: 1. Generate a unique employment status name using the current timestamp 2. Create a JSON request body with the generated name 3. Send a POST request to the '/web/index.php/api/v2/admin/employment-statuses' endpoint with a valid cookie and request body 4.
